ability.flavor: You prick little needles on the tips of your fingers into the nerves of your enemies and cause them to lose control.

metadata.flavor: You prick little needles on the tips of your fingers into the nerves of your enemies and cause them to lose control.

effect.t1: 2 damage; if the target has R < WEAK, before the damage is resolved, they make a free strike.
effect.t2: 5 damage; if the target has R < AVERAGE, before the damage is resolved, they use a main action ability of your choice.
effect.t3: 7 damage; if the target has R < STRONG, before the damage is resolved, they can shift up to their speed and use a main action ability of your choice.

effects.effect: You choose the new targets for the original target's free strike or ability. Additionally, if you are hidden or disguised, using this ability doesn't cause you to be revealed.
